Article.ArticleTitle: Complete genome sequence of a human enterovirus 71 strain isolated in brunei in 2006.

Abstract.AbstractText: The complete genome sequence of a human enterovirus 71 strain isolated in Brunei in 2006 was determined. Phylogenetic analysis based on the complete genome sequence classified this strain into subgenogroup B5.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Virology Unit, Department of Laboratory Services, Ministry of Health, Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei.
